original: Blomquist, Carl Knutsson, kyrkoherde, FHsby, f. 5/11/04 i Västra N>% Östergötl. 1., av dir. Knut B. o. Beata Puke. G. 1. m. Margareta Rönnau, d. 39; 2. m. Kerstin Arfwidsson. Barn: Elisabet f. 33, Ragnhild 34, Anders 37, Hans o. Margareta ff. 39, Agneta 44, Eva 46. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 22, fil. kand. 27, teol. kand., prakt, teol. prov o. prästvigd f. Linköp. stift 31. V. kommin. i Linköp. 31, kommin. i Törnevalla 32, stiftsadj. 39, kyrkoadj. i Hedvig 42, kyrkoh. i Flisby 43.
translated: Blomquist, Carl Knutsson, clergyman, FHsby, born on November 5th, 1904 in Västra Norra Östergötland County, son of director Knut B. and Beata Puke. He was married twice: first to Margareta Rönnau who passed away in 1939, and later to Kerstin Arfwidsson. His children are Elisabet (born in 1933), Ragnhild (1934), Anders (1937), Hans and Margareta (twins born in 1939), Agneta (1944), and Eva (1946). He completed his studentexamen in Stockholm in 1922 and received his filosofie kandidat degree in 1927. He then earned his teologiekandidat degree and was ordained as a priest for the Linköping diocese in 1931. He served as assistant curate in Linköping in 1931, curate in Törnevalla in 1932, diocesan adjunct in 1939, church adjunct in Hedvig in 1942, and finally became the vicar of Flisby in 1943.
